text:
//////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////
////////Bod Requester v2//////////////
//////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////
if not timerexists 'bodtimer'
  createtimer 'bodtimer'
  settimer 'bodtimer' 300000
endif
if not timerexists 'bodtimer1'
  createtimer 'bodtimer1'
  settimer 'bodtimer1' 300000
endif
if not timerexists 'bodtimer2'
  createtimer 'bodtimer2'
  settimer 'bodtimer2' 300000
endif
if not timerexists 'bodtimer3'
  createtimer 'bodtimer3'
  settimer 'bodtimer3' 300000
endif
if not timerexists 'bodtimer4'
  createtimer 'bodtimer4'
  settimer 'bodtimer4' 300000
endif
if not timerexists 'bodtimer5'
  createtimer 'bodtimer5'
  settimer 'bodtimer5' 300000
endif
if not listexists 'Gumps'
  createlist 'Gumps'
  pushlist 'Gumps' 0xd6bcf63a
  pushlist 'Gumps' 0x9bade6ea
  pushlist 'Gumps' 0x307b71a8
  pushlist 'Gumps' 0x15bc9aa4
endif
for 0 to Gumps
  while @gumpexists Gumps[]
    if @gumpexists 0x9bade6ea
      replygump 0x9bade6ea 1
    elseif @gumpexists 0xd6bcf63a
      replygump 0xd6bcf63a 1
    elseif @gumpexists 0x307b71a8
      replygump 0x307b71a8 1
    elseif @gumpexists 0x15bc9aa4
      replygump 0x15bc9aa4 1
      pause 1000
    endif
  endwhile
endfor
if timer 'bodtimer' >= 300000
  waitforcontext 0xd5240 3 15000
  waitforgump 'any' 15000
  settimer 'bodtimer' 0
endif
if timer 'bodtimer1' >= 300000
  waitforcontext 0xd53f3 4 15000
  waitforgump 'any' 15000
  settimer 'bodtimer1' 0
endif
if timer 'bodtimer2' >= 300000
  waitforcontext 0xd57e5 3 15000
  waitforgump 'any' 15000
  settimer 'bodtimer2' 0
endif
if timer 'bodtimer3' >= 300000
  waitforcontext 0xd5827 3 15000
  waitforgump 'any' 15000
  settimer 'bodtimer3' 0
endif
if timer 'bodtimer4' >= 300000
  waitforcontext 0xd589b 3 15000
  waitforgump 'any' 15000
  settimer 'bodtimer4' 0
endif
if timer 'bodtimer5' >= 300000
  waitforcontext 0xe7de2 3 15000
  waitforgump 'any' 15000
  settimer 'bodtimer5' 0
endif
if weight > 292
  msg '[ffp'
endif
title: bod collector
